description:
This market will resolve according to the winner of the Major 2 DreamHack tournament (Call of Duty League Major II, hosted at DreamHack Birmingham), currently scheduled for March 27-29, 2026.

If this tournament is postponed to start after April 21, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, canceled, or a winner has not been declared within this timeframe, this market will resolve to “Other”.

If multiple teams are declared winners, this market will resolve in favor of the team whose listed team name comes first alphabetically.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the tournament organizer, Call of Duty League (https://callofdutyleague.com/); however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: DreamHack Major 2: Winner

question: Will OpTic Texas win DreamHack Major 2?
